title: The World of life: a journal of the outdoors. Issue No. 17
creator_credit: Countryman Films, John Taylor, Grahame Tharp and Leon Clore
brief_description: A magazine containing the following items - Small wonder - birth of the first West African baboon in captivity at London Zoo; Little Giant - arrival by air of an Indian elephant for London Zoo; Troubled Waters - lifeboat station at Walmer on the Kentish coast near the Goodwin Sands. From the series “The World of Life - A journal of the outdoors”.
